If windows7 does not boot

  1. Boot from a Product CD/DVD.
  2. Select “Repair”
  3. Select Command Prompt.
  4. Try these and see what fixes it
    1. Fix MBR
      bootrec.exe /FixMbr
    2. Fix Boot Sector
      bootrec.exe /FixBoot
    3. Rebuild BCD
      bootrec.exe /RebuildBcd

http://www.tomshardware.com/news/win7-windows-7-mbr,10036.html
